import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import axios from 'axios'; import { selectedProduct } from '../../redux/actions/productActions' import RelatedProducts from './RelatedProducts'; import CategoryProduct from './CategoryProduct'; import BestSellerProduct from './BestSellerProduct'; import ProductTag from './ProductTag'; // import { addItem, delItem } from '../../redux/actions/index'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const DetailProduct = () => { //const proid = useParams(); // const detailid = data.filter(s => s.id === proid.id); //const product = detailid[0]; //console.log(product); // const dispatch = useDispatch(); // const [addcart, setAddCart] = useState('add to cart'); // const hendleAddtoCart = (product) => { // if (addcart === 'add to cart') { // dispatch(addItem(product)) // setAddCart('remove form cart') // } else { // dispatch(delItem(product)) // setAddCart('add to cart') // } // } function formatNumber(number) { var numString = number.toString() var result = '' while (numString.length > 3) { var chunk = numString.substr(-3) numString = numString.substr(0, numString.length - 3) result = ',' + chunk + result } if (numString.length > 0) { result = numString + result } return result } const product = useSelector((state) => state.product) const { maSP, tenSP, giaSP, urlAnhSanPham, size, soluong, ngayThem, mota, review, xuatXu, baoHanh, kichThuoc, giaKhuyenMai, trangThai, danhmucNavigation, thuongHieuNavigation, chatLieuNavigation, khuyenMaiNavigation, danhMucHinhNavigation, commentsNavigation } = product; const { id } = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const fetchProductDetail = async () => { const response = await axios .get(`https://localhost:44336/api/Home/${id}`) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); dispatch(selectedProduct(response.data)); } useEffect(() => { if (id && id !== '') { fetchProductDetail(); } }, [id]); console.log(product); return (
